posts.title: Starting Blog
posts.text: Welcome to David’s blog!I am excited to start my first blog. This is Yongbock (David) Kwon who likes studying statistics, especially machine learning. I love to listen to musics! I started this blog to record what I study, what I listen to, and what I think in my daily life, because I have a bad memory. And, the record is the one that is able to get over against the river of time as a human. Hence, this blog will be my study notes, my diary, and the representation of myself. Let’s begin!
